install.name: MultiShare
install.author: Juan Padial
install.description: Provide a social bookmark widget for your content articles. You can use whatever code form whatever bookmark service or use Addthis. If you decide to use Addthis you can control all options of Addthis button.

param.name: excludeSectionID
param.label: Exclude Section ID
param.description: Exclude specific section ID (to specify more than one section, seperate with a comma , ). Use 0 for uncategorized.

param.name: excludeCategoryID
param.label: Exclude category ID
param.description: Exclude specific category ID (to specify more than one category, seperate with a comma , ). Use 0 for uncategorized.

param.name: excludeID
param.label: Exclude content ID
param.description: Exclude specific content items (to specify more than one article, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: shareservice
param.label: Select Addthis or other if you want to add a code from other service.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: AddThis Options

param.name: addthis_pub
param.label: Enter the name of your AddThis account.

param.name: addthis_brand
param.label: Enter your brand text, for example: My Site.

param.name: addthis_brand_color
param.label: Enter the colour for brand text, hexadecimal without #.

param.name: addthis_brand_background_color
param.label: Enter the colour for background of brand text, hexadecimal without #.

param.name: LogoURL
param.label: Enter the URL of your logo image.

param.name: addthis_logo_background_color
param.label: Enter the color you want to display in backgroud of your logo image, hexadecimal without #.

param.name: addthis_logo_color
param.label: Enter the color you want for your text from addthis beside your logo image, hexadecimal without #.

param.name: Language
param.label: Enter two letter code for menu language.

param.name: Buttonimage
param.label: URL of custom button image.
param.description: Enter full URL with http where is stored your custom button image. Leave blank to use default.

param.name: addthis_services_order
param.default: favorites, email, digg, delicious, myspace, facebook, google, live, more
param.label: Enter the bookmark services you want to use separated by comma.
param.description: Enter the services you want to use separated by comma. aim, aolfav, ask, backflip, ballhype, blinklist, blogmarks, bluedot, buzz, delicious, digg, diigo, email, facebook, favorites, fark, feedmelinks, friendfeed, furl, google, kaboodle, kirtsy, linkedin, live, magnolia, misterwong, mixx, multiply, myweb, myspace, netvous, newsvine, print, propeller, reddit, segnalo, sharedstuff, slashdot, spurl, stumbleupon, stylehive, tailrank, technorati, thisnext, twitter, yardbarker, yahoobkm, more.

param.name: @spacer2
param.label: CSS and style

param.name: Show
param.label: Choose if you want to shhow the button after article text, before article text or both.

param.name: DivCSS
param.label: Enter css style for the div which contain the button. For example: float: right;

param.name: @spacer3
param.label: ShareThis Code

param.name: SharethisCode
param.label: Enter the code of your ShareThis button.

param.name: @spacer4
param.label: Tellafriend code (SocialTwist)

param.name: TellafriendCode
param.label: Enter the Tellafriend's code (SocialTwist).

param.name: @spacer5
param.label: Custom/other service Code

param.name: CustomCode
param.label: Enter the code from other Share service.

param.name: URI
param.label: Script URI.
